comment: A great teacher. Material is clearly presented as well as students given opportunities to succeed and work with her. She is very understanding about the circumstances of life and is more than willing to help out with anything. Overall, really enjoyed her class!

Honestly she's the best professor I have ever had during my time at Kennesaw. She is really willing to work with you, and understands there is a life outside her class. She's very passionate about what she's teaching, and it shows through her class.
Super helpful and inspiring. Really great teachers, easy grader too.

Best professor ever! She is so nice and makes class interesting and fun. She is always so happy and fills the classroom with positive energy. She is flexible with assignments and gives great feedback! Take her if you can!!

This is my favorite class. Dr. Raynice is probably the sweetest, most flexible professor I've ever had. She's extremely knowledgeable and is beyond helpful. Her class is fun and engaging. I don't even mind that I'm taking her Friday class, she's just that great. Take her!

Dr. Raynice is one of my all time favorite professors - she's awesome!  She will answer all your questions, is informative and flexible with assignments, her classes are interesting and she's tries to make them fun as well.  She's very knowledgeable and the workload was not too bad.  Take her!!

Dr. Rayneice is by far one of the best teachers that I have ever had. She is very helpful whenever you have questions about assignments and is very flexible with due dates. I would not get the book I rarely used it.

I love, love, love Dr. Raynice! She is by far the best professor in the ECE program. She wants her students to exceed and cares about their experience not only in the field, but in her classroom. She is extremely helpful. She's just a ray of sunshine :)

She's AWESOME! Take her if you can. She keeps class fun and interesting, although about 4 sessions are cancelled in order to provide time for preschool field work. I wouldn't buy the textbook, we didn't use it at all. She's a great teacher, enthusiastic and very knowledgeable.

She is an awesome teacher. She is flexible with due dates if you have other obligations, you just let her know in advance. She is caring, understanding, and loves her job! I would take her again any day!
She is awesome and very helpful
This is the best class ever, wonderful energetic teacher, methods are superb, she will inspire you to teach. A must take teacher who cares about her students and their grades....

My favorite prof. at KSU! Her class is interesting and the information she covers is useful and helpful for the field. She gives great lectures and gives examples from her exp. in preschools. Her grading is fair. She is flexible. She cares. She is awesome!
